message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will meet your needs.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the quality of the product, $12000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $9000 for it. This would be a fair price for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that 12000 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for 10500. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you and the value I place on it.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $10500 is still a bit too high for me. I'm prepared to pay $9500 for the product.  This would be a win-win scenario for both of us, as it's closer to my budget and still a good price for you.

I understand that 10500 is still a bit out of your budget, Bob. However, I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for 11000. This is a compromise that I think is fair, considering the value the product holds for you and the value I place on it.
